original_text: The Lord Almighty says, “I will cause bad things to happen in the house of the man that robs anyone. I will cause bad things to happen in the house of the man that speaks false words. It is as if the words on the paper will destroy the houses of those bad people.” ’
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 내가 이것을 보냈나니 도둑의 집에도 들어가며 내 이름을 가리켜 망령되이 맹세하는 자의 집에도 들어가서 그의 집에 머무르며 그 집을 나무와 돌과 아울러 사르리라 하셨느니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: I will cause bad things to happen
in the house of the man that robs anyone
I will cause bad things to happen
in the house of the man that speaks false words
It is as if the words on the paper
will destroy the houses of those bad people

sentences.korean_translation: the walls and beams will be completely destroyed
